attributes.review: as soon as the app downloaded, three ninjas with trump hats smashed through my window and attempted to arrest me for being bisexual. After they left I had to clean up the broken glass and since trump got rid of medical protections for lgbt people I had to stitch up my wounds myself. Plus the app was glitchy.
